name: Attack
note:
<target action>
camera focus: target, front base, 20
zoom: 150%, 20
move user: target, front base, 30
wait for movement
motion swing: user
perform action
action animation: target
wait for animation
action effect: target
perform finish
<\target action>

<follow action>
reset camera: 20
reset zoom: 20
<\follow action>

name: Guard
note:
<target action>
camera focus: target, base, 10
zoom: 150%, 10
perform action
action animation: target
wait for animation
action effect: user
death break
<\target action>

<finish action>
reset camera: 20
reset zoom: 20
collapse: user
<\finish action>

description: Heals some of a target's HP.
name: Heal

description: Deal damage to a single enemy with a ball of fire.
name: Fireball
note:
<target action>
camera focus: target, front base, 20
zoom: 120%, 20
motion swing: user
perform action
action animation: target
wait for animation
action effect: target
death break
perform finish
<\target action>

<follow action>
reset camera: 20
reset zoom: 20
<\follow action>

description: Deal damage to all enemies with pillars of fire.
name: Fire Pillars
note:
<whole action>
camera focus: targets, front base, 20
zoom: 120%, 20
motion swing: user
perform action
action animation: target
wait for animation
action effect: target
death break
perform finish
<\whole action>

<follow action>
reset camera: 20
reset zoom: 20
<\follow action>

description: An attack so fast that it looks like the user vanishes.
name: Photon Slash
note:
<setup action>
OPACITY USER: 0%, 40
camera focus: user, 10
zoom: 120%
WAIT for OPACITY
camera focus: target, front base, 10
move user: target, front base, 10
wait for movement
<\setup action>

<follow action>
opacity user: 100%, 1
WAIT MOVE
<\FOLLOW ACTION>

description:
A combination of powerful slashes designed to damage
a single opponent.
name: Makendo Slash
note:
<target action>
camera focus: target
zoom: 120%, 30
wait for movement
face user: target
motion attack: user
action animation
ani wait: 2
action effect
move user: targets, front center, 5
face user: target
motion attack: user
ani wait: 3
action effect
move user: targets, back top, 5
face user: target
ani wait: 3
action effect
move user: targets, front, 5
face user: target
motion attack: user
ani wait: 3
action effect
move user: targets, back center, 5
face user: target
motion attack: user
ani wait: 5
action effect
move user: targets front, 10
immortal: target, false
jump user: 200%, 10
face user: forward
wait for animation
wait for movement
<\target action>

<follow action>
zoom: 100%, 60
opacity not focus: 100%
wait for opacity
<\follow action>
